function depositFunds() public payable {
        balances[msg.sender] += msg.value;

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_12.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (patch_12.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls

Low level call in EtherStore.withdrawFunds (patch_12.sol#12-19):
	-require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_weiToWithdraw)()) patch_12.sol#18

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_weiToWithdraw' of EtherStore.withdrawFunds (patch_12.sol#12) is not in mixedCase
